title: Exposure to HIV virus, treatment before birth linked to obesity later in life

title_detail.value: Exposure to HIV virus, treatment before birth linked to obesity later in life

summary: Teens and young adults who were exposed to HIV and antiretroviral therapy before birth but are HIV-negative themselves are at increased risk of obesity and asthma-like symptoms.

summary_detail.value: Teens and young adults who were exposed to HIV and antiretroviral therapy before birth but are HIV-negative themselves are at increased risk of obesity and asthma-like symptoms.
